name: Tik Tak Boom
description:
The cooler is broken , now the engine will explode
Go fast to get resources to repair the water pomp while u keep the engine safe 

DON'T USE CHEATS PLEASE !!!

If you stop collecting resources to upgrade you will die without noticing

Game made for GameDev Insider Jam # 1

Game made with Construct 3

All the credits are in the game.

Thanks for Playing
